text:
Table 21 Designs and delivery
Product design and development
Create new products and services that solve customer problems using hypothesis-driven design thinking
Enable fast flow from development to production and reliable releases by standardizing process and reducing variability and batch sizes.
Feature design and implementation and test, with a focus on user experience that may require work that has never been performed continuously as quickly as possible. Estimates are highly uncertain. Cycle times should be well-known and predictable. Outcomes are highly variable.
